textBeforeTable: Common monsters found in just about any dungeon. Basic Monsters See Traits for a full list of traits and what they do. Also see the list of bosses. List of Monsters Or, in graphic form: 2 9th 3 8th 3 7th 3 6th 4 5th 4 4th 4 3rd 5 2nd 10 1st Number Level Distribution Not counting bosses and special uniques, each dungeon contains 38 monsters, with the following level distribution What kind of dungeon you are in also affects monster stats. Monsters in easy dungeons have 90% of way they would normally have, monsters in Normal dungeons have their normal stats, monsters in hard dungeons have 120% of what they would normally have, and monsters in vicious dungeons have 133% of what they would normally have. 159 75 10 134 63
textAfterTable: Advanced Monsters Stronger monsters found as you venture further outside the kingdom. This list does not include any variety of Plant.
